column5: of dracut formally of somersworth passed away peacefully tuesday june 9
column6: 2015. she was the wife of the late tremaine gower. she is survived by her children virginia james and her husband jed of dracut
column10: karen darling and jake paris of winter haven
column14: terry gower and his wife pat of dover
column22: a sister dianne childs and her husband donald of saint john
column25: a brother robert whittaker and his wife margaret of quispamsis
column30: and many friends in dover and dracut. a private graveside service will be in pine hill cemetery of dover
column31: nh. arrangements are by tasker funeral home 621 central ave.
